lead_paragraph: After Smith injured his knee in the second quarter against the Ravens, he stood on the sideline for the second half. Namath questioned the extent of Smith’s injury, which turned out to be a torn A.C.L.

headline.print_headline: Namath Admits Criticism of Jets’ Smith Was ‘My Bad’
headline.main: Joe Namath Apologizes for Criticism of Jets’ Geno Smith

snippet: After Smith injured his knee in the second quarter against the Ravens, he stood on the sideline for the second half. Namath questioned the extent of Smith’s injury, which turned out to be a torn A.C.L....
abstract: Photo shows American John John Florence competing in World Surf league championship event in Portugal.
